mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug (drug_name, `function`, drug_price, inbound_date, expiration_date, stock_quantity) VALUES (#{drug_name}, #{function}, #{drug_price}, #{inbound_date}, #{expiration_date}, #{stock_quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE drug SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity + #{quantity} WHERE drug_id = #{drugId}
UPDATE drug SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - #{quantity} WHERE drug_id = #{drugId}
